Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)
The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Evaluate \E*val"u*ate\ ([-e]*v[a^]l"[-u]*[=a]t), v. t. [See {Evaluation}.] To fix the value of; to rate; to appraise. [1913 Webster]
evaluate v : place a value on; judge the worth of something; "I will have the family jewels appraised by a professional" [syn: {measure}, {valuate}, {assess}, {appraise}, {value}]
